name: Nexus of Power
description:
Nexus of Power is a top-down 2D strategy game in which you attempt to conquer maps by channelling power from the towers you control to the ones you don't.

Features include 16 unique maps to play across, LAN games supporting up to 4 players and campaign games in which you can attempt to conquer the entire campaign map step by step! The AI features three levels of difficulty, there is a full introductory tutorial to get you used to the game mechanic, and there are 10 achievements to unlock.

Supports mouse and touchscreen interfaces. Requires an OpenGL 2.0 compliant graphics card to run.
